result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ
result.translation: 4. Tohuk lakal Kaadu wagitto qaraanâ fanah namma adda gacam gacisey, wagta numow kunti qunxaane luk bura luk kol aduurelek, Yallih ginot hebelto cooca able kalah, is wagittok taqabba itteh.
